page.title: 14MAYDAY
page.content: Re-established some eight years ago is the village Mayday.This day is divided into two parts -a morning session when streets within the village community construct their own floats for a parade around the village and to be judged for the best float. The afternoon is made up of dancing displays by Morris Dancers and children doing Maypole dancing. There is sometimes an evening dancing and barbecue event. Any money which is raised at these events is used to improve the facilities in the village playing field e.g. to purchase the redundant Youth Hostel (recently closed) to make this into a club house for village organisations.
